help.description: To get help on all supported commands, or a specified command

directory.description: Set or get the current directory for the FullStack-Lesson-Plans

week.description: Type week to see what the current week is set to. Type 'week 5' to set to week 5.

day.description: Type day to see what the current day is set to. Type 'day 5' to set to day 5.

gem.description: Fetches details of the specified Ruby gem
